content:
Brachfeld family

1 Henuch BRACHFELD                   c1745 (Marcus) {census family 62}
 + Rosel                             c1765 (Juda)
  2x Salomon Ber BRACHFELD           1778-82 - 1837 #141
    + Chai  / Sara                   1785-89 - 1832 #280/ 1833 #287 (Feiwel)
     3o Marya BRACHFELD              1825 #187 - 1825 #114

       * Lobel ORDER                 1820 #280
             married Nov 29, 1883 #106
           FAMILY LISTING
